description.narrative: Strengthening institutional Capacities mainstream and monitor Rio Convention implementation through development policies, programmmes and plans

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 1. Strengthened environmental information management and monitoring system (EIMMS) for improved implementation of the Rio Conventions. 2. Institutional and technical capacities are strengthened to create knowledge and mainstream Rio Conventions within national development frameworks. 3. Improved awareness and environmental education on the linkages between Rio Conventions and national sustainable development objectives. 4. Identification of other project priorities

comment.narrative: 1. Guyana's environmental information monitoring and management system is inadequate. 2. There is little inter-ministerial coordination on the implementation of natural resource and environmental policies. 3. Despite the availability of scientific knowledge the data are no sufficiently used in the formulation of strategies or policy instruments. 4. No

Output 1.2: Formulate by-laws and operational guidance to mainstream Rio Conventions into policies 1) Learning-by-doing training workshops to reconcile weaknesses and gaps in key environmental policies and legal instruments 2)Formulated and approved by-laws, policy, legislative, and other or regulatory instruments and operational guidelines to mainstream Rio Conventions.
Output 1.3 Undertake targeted institutional reforms for Rio Convention monitoring and mainstreaming
1)Programme for carrying out recommended institutional reforms of output 1.1 2)Technical working groups negotiate and institutionalize better consultative and decision-making processes 3)Memoranda of agreement on sharing data and consultative and decision-making processes
Output 1.4: Strengthen an institutional mechanism for the long-term monitoring of Rio Convention implementation 1)Existing environmental databases and information management systems strengthened 2)Improved data and information management arrangements 3)Technical interpretation material on the use of the EIMMS 4)EIMMS set up through networking existing data and information management systems and networks 5)Technological requirements to set up EIMMS installed 6)Tracking mechanism to monitor the use of the EIMMS
Output 1.5: Resource mobilization strategy 1) Resource mobilization strategy informed by best practices and lessons learned from other similar resource mobilization strategies 2)Workshops to negotiate collaboration to mobilize and manage financial resources for Rio Convention implementation
Output 1.6 Test the mainstreaming and monitoring exercises through a high value programme and/or plan 1) Pilot activities and exercises that emphasize best practices and demonstrate objectives under the three Rio Conventions 2)Lessons Learned Report used to develop EIMMS roadmap for circulation
Output 2.1: In-depth assessment of technical skills needed to integrate Rio Conventions into policies, programmes, and plans 1) Baseline and end-of-project surveys on technical capacities
Output 2.2: Training programme and material 1) Training programme revised based on the results and lessons learned from project implementation
Output 2.3: Training on analytical skills and methodologies to mainstream and monitor Rio Convention implementation 1)Training courses on the use of databases and information systems 2) Learning-by-doing training workshops on analytical skills and methodologies to mainstream Rio Conventions
Output 3.2: Brochures and articles on the Rio Conventions 1) Brochures and articles on the Rio Conventions that highlight the importance of the Rio Conventions and help individuals understand how their daily lives are impacted by the global environment
Output 4.2: Capacity Development Strategy and Action Plan 1) Roundtable for donors convened to leverage financial support from development partners
Project management 1) Identification of other project priorities

OUTPUT 1.2 1) On-going activity 2) No
Output 1.3 1) On-going 2) On-going 3) On-going, to date nine (9) MOAs have been negotiated and signed off to share data and information per institutional reforms.

Output 1.1 1) Collate and distribute relevant legal and regulatory texts pertaining to environmental protection
Output 1.3 1) Convene technical working groups to negotiate better consultative and decision-making processes 2) Memoranda of agreement to improve collaboration and sharing of data and information
Output 1.4 1) Strengthen existing environmental databases and information management systems 2) Structure improved data and information management arrangements. A data protocol system is developed and tested 3) Identify and select new and improved Rio Convention indicators and measurement methodologies 4) Draft technical interpretation material on the use of the EIMMS 5) Identify, procure, and install technological requirements to set up the EIMMS 6) Develop a tracking mechanism to monitor the use of the EIMMS
Output 1.5 1) Resource mobilization strategy completed
Output 1.6 1) Convene technical working groups to integrate Rio Conventions in the selected development plan 2) Set up the institutional arrangements to implement the pilot activities and exercises from feasibility study in year 1 3) Cull lessons learned and best practices from activities to inform EIMMS roadmap
Output 2.2 1) Update and revise training programme based on the results and lessons learned 2) Undertake training courses on the use of databases and information systems 3) Undertake learning-by-doing training workshops on analytical skills and methodologies
Output 3.1 1) Prepare articles on linkages between the global environment and socio-economic issues 2) Prepare and air a public service announcement on Rio Convention mainstreaming
Output 3.4 1) Develop and apply an awareness module for institutions on Rio Conventions mainstreaming 2) Prepare and integrate an environmental awareness module 3) National Capacity Self - Assessment update completed
Output 4.2 1) Convene donor roundtable 2) Finalize and present the NCSA Final Report and Action Plan
